help_message:
To run with current parameters:
python3 runner.py --func [name of function]
All parameters can be changed in config.json file
Most important parameters can be changed by adding --[name of parameter] [value of parameter]
To get the list of command line parameters for a particular function:
python3 runner.py -h --func [name of function]
If function parameters are supplied, the config for this function is overwritten with new values
To suppress this behavior, use -n flag

extract_vb_files_from_mail.description:
Extracts Vakifbank report excel files from an Outlook folder,
gives them a proper name and stores in a dedicated directory

commands.target_directory: Destinastion folder for storing report files
commands.folder: Outlook folder to look for new reports

entities.NLMK Turkey: NLMK TURKEY ÇELİK TİCARET ANONİM ŞİRKETİ

Extracts excel Vakifbank report files from an Outlook folder,
gives them a proper name and stores in a dedicated directory

commands.target_directory: Destinastion folder for storing report files
